Sentencas: La0.95Ca0.05Nb1-xCoxO4 = 0, 0.01, 0.02, 0.03, 0.05) compounds have been synthesized by a conventional solid state reaction method at 1150 degrees C. Co and Ca have been simultaneously introduced into LaNbO4 solid solution for the first time, taking the place of La and Nb sites, respectively.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and conductivity of cobalt doped lanthanum niobate as electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Dense ceramic pellets of La0.95Ca0.05Nb1-xCoxO4 have been prepared by sintering at 1300 degrees C with the utilization of cobalt as the sintering aid.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and conductivity of cobalt doped lanthanum niobate as electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The conductivity measurement has been carried out for all the samples in wet air.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and conductivity of cobalt doped lanthanum niobate as electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that conductivity of La0.95Ca0.05Nb1-xCoxO4 compounds are higher than that of LaNbO4 attributed to additional oxygen vacancies generated by Co and Ca co-doping.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and conductivity of cobalt doped lanthanum niobate as electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The strategy of doping cobalt as a sintering aid proposed in this work could be served as a valid way to enhance the sinterability and electrical conductivity of LaNbO4 based proton conducting oxides.
Titulo: Enhanced sinterability and conductivity of cobalt doped lanthanum niobate as electrolyte for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell
